devdoc.author: NFTfi
devdoc.details: Provides logic to transfer ERC721, uses regular transferFrom instead of safe

transferNFT(address,address,address,uint.details: Transfers ERC721 `_nftId` handled by the contract `_nftContract` from `_sender` to `_recipient`

params._recipient: - The new owner of the ERC721
params._sender: - The current owner of the ERC721

returns._0: true if successfully transferred, false otherwise

devdoc.title: ERC721LegacyWrapper
